main.name: Pamilerin Aribisogan
main.description: Hi, I'm Pamilerin, a Full-Stack Web developer and I design webpages using React, HTML5, PHP
main.bio:
Hi, I'm Pamilerin, a Full-Stack Web developer with expertise in programming languages such as ReactJs, PHP, HTML5, CSS, JAVA... 
 Well-organised person, problem solver, independent employee with high attention to details. I deliver high quality designs based on client's specifications. Manage project smoothly smoothly to accomplish customer's objectives. Background includes graphics designs and performance optimization.

education.description: My thesis project was to develop a course and classroom scheduling system for my department, which a bit exciting.

Followed my passion in a core of prototyping and cloud computing classes.
Excelled in user experience and user interfaces. Also, developed a Complaint Management System.

work.title: IT Consultant
work.description: I analyse and evaluate the company's IT infrastructure,understanding a client's business needs and designing and implementing a technology solution.

work.title: Graduate Trainee
work.description: Worked with a team to oversee the functionality of the institute website, evaluate the website performances, update website content.
